So I'm using a modded wheel but I discovered that placing 2 wheels mirrored leaves them crooked, so I can't drive straight...

Is there a way to fix this in the config file ? I don't want to place 4 seperated wheels.

I don't want to dump the wheel, I like it.

Are they surface or node attach?  if you change the attach node to a small stack node , does the node appear to be centered?  If not get node helper and tweak it in game then transfer  coords to an attach node. 

The only other thing I can think of is the model is actually offset from it's origin, which could still be jiggled with nodes, but not as sure a fix, what are the wheels off? because some older rovers had handed wheel sets? all else fails drop me a zip and I'll tweak it
